message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.QI. 

The paper deals with quantum information retrieval from distributed storage systems, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR). The use of MDS codes and locally repairable codes suggests a connection to coding theory (cs.DS) and error-correcting codes (cs.CC). Finally, the use of quantum systems for information retrieval places the paper in the realm of quantum information (cs.QI).
